TopicTitle: Make camera zoom in more when EVAing a Kerbal

Articles.Content:
It's always annoyed me that whenever I make a Kerbal go on EVA or remove one from a command seat, the camera zooms way out and I have to zoom in myself. This is just a simple suggestion that camera is more zoomed in when you take a Kerbal on EVA. It's not a big deal, but would make me have to do a lot less scrolling.

While we're on this subject, how about increasing the default scroll mouse sensitivity? Or maybe that's just a mouse feature, not something you can change in KSP. But really, I feel that it could easily be 3x as sensitive so I wouldn't have to scroll so much.

This is just one of my pet peeves.

I am not sure everyone agrees with you. If it starts zoomed in as you suggest many people may not like it.

How about saving the zoom level at the end of the previous EVA and attempt to use it for your next one? Maybe that would appeal to more people.

Also, it would be nice to be able to change the roll of the camera on EVA. I am always annoyed when I want to take a screenshot and I can't get the picture I want just because I landed my craft on a slope.
